tool.name: Remove.otus
tool.description: Removes OTUs from various file formats

param.name: intype
param.label: Which type of files will you be supplying?

param.name: otu
param.label: shared/list - allows you to input a list file you wish to select OTUs from.

param.name: label
param.label: label - pick (one) OTU Label
param.help: By default first label in your file is used

param.name: otu
param.label: cons.taxonomy/otu.corr/axes file
param.help: constaxonomy file can be obtained by the running classify.otu tool, otucorr from otu.association tool, and corraxes from corr.axes command

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documentation**
The remove.otus command removes otu labels from cons.taxonomy, corr.axes, otu.corr, shared and list files. This can be useful especially with subsampled datasets or when groups have been selected.
.. _remove.otus: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Remove.otus
